attributes.action: Reduce or abolish taxes on all environmentally-friendly and energy-saving products, to make them more attractive to consumers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reducing or abolishing the taxes on all environmentally-friendly and energy-saving products would make them more attractive to, and more popular with, the public. This would result in greater take-up, which would increase energy savings and help the environment.
